title: Bit-Changer
author: Bit-Changer
content: We are Bit-Changer - a service for buying and selling cryptocurrency. Our list of the most popular exchange directions includes ruble (bank cards and kiwi)-BTC, ruble (bank cards and kiwi)-USDT.We serve a large number of Russian banks, the most recognizable of which are: Sberbank, Tinkoff Bank and Alfa Bank; and also we serve payments through Kiwi payment system.The list of provided cryptocurrencies (29 tokens in total) includes coins such as BTC, USDT, LTC, XMR, and others.For the user, we provide a favorable exchange rate, high speed, security, confidentiality of the exchange. We help all clients understand the large and complex world of cryptocurrency and make their first transactions.To conduct an exchange operation for the currencies you are interested in, follow the link to our official website: https://bit-changer.cc/We are also open to partnerships with businesses in any field: exchange offices, exchanges, services for buying games and keys to them, etc.WE WILL HELP YOU:Connecting your business to our payment solutions. With setting limits and conditions for clients.With the connection of the payment systems and currencies you need.With control and management of all incoming and outgoing cash flows.WE GUARANTEE:The market rate for buying and selling assets.Increased client traffic and conversions to pay by up to 80%. High transaction processing speed.Privacy of your data.No internal commissions for your clients.For more information about our offer, write to us at info@bit-changer.cc or via Telegram: https:/ /t.me/bitchanger_official . We will be glad to cooperate!
